Detailed Description

Processor that provides the SiPM temperature.

The processor generates and updates a CALICE MappedContainer object from the conditions data. To obtain the object in other processors use: SiPMTemperatureProcessor::getTemperatureContainer("temperature processor name");

Author:
angela-isabela.lucaci-timoce@desy.de
